subject: refactor(debug): replace modal with one-tap copy debug report
body:
The previous debug modal required opening a scrollable log, finding
entries, and copying them individually — too many steps on mobile.

Replaced with a single "Copy Debug Report" button that copies a
complete plain-text diagnostic report to clipboard in one tap.
The report includes environment (URL, user agent), API endpoint,
request summary, HTTP response (status, body, elapsed time), and
error details — formatted for pasting into another session to
diagnose email sending issues.

Fallback: if clipboard API fails on mobile, shows a pre-selected
textarea for manual copy.
